definitions.definition: A situation which poses an immediate risk and which requires urgent attention .
examples: Cardiac arrest is an emergency requiring medical attention.

definitions.definition: The department of a hospital that treats emergencies.
A person brought in at short notice to replace a member of staff , a player in a sporting team, etc.
The quality of being emergent ; sudden or unexpected appearance; an unforeseen occurrence .
A critical urge to urinate or defecate .

main_definition: ( sometimes attributive ) A situation which poses an immediate risk and which requires urgent attention .
secondary_definitions: The department of a hospital that treats emergencies.
A person brought in at short notice to replace a member of staff , a player in a sporting team, etc.
( archaic ) The quality of being emergent ; sudden or unexpected appearance; an unforeseen occurrence .
( euphemistic ) A critical urge to urinate or defecate .
